name: Mutsu Enmei-ryu Hidden Art: Ryuha
description: All attribute cards ATK x6, 25% all damage reduction when attacking with 4 of Fire, Water, Wood, Light & Dark orb types at the same time. Deal ATK x100 damage to all enemies after every orbs elimination. Ignores enemy element, but can be reduced by enemy defense down to 0 damage.
